item.title: Cache-Downloader problem.. 3 weeks still no solution
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Alright so ive done absolutely everything i needed to do, to fix my cache-downloader but i cant get it to work… for some reason i receive these errors…

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TripPk V4\Data\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:177) at client.startUp(client.java:8305) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5290) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

now when i check my c:\ drive, i only see 4 files inside the cache folders, it stops before it even has a chance to download them all…
here is my cachedownloader.java the main area for the download.

public client client; public final int BUFFER = 1024; public static final int VERSION = 2; public String cacheLink = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/76sxc9lkdb4oc1o/TripPk%2520V4.zip"; public String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

signlink.java

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "TripPk V4"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch(Exception _ex) { } return null; }

can someone please help me fix this… im on a 317 pi
